name: X-Design
tagline: Smart AI suite for authentic lifestyle product images
description: Create warm, realistic product photos from a single image. X-Design helps small sellers turn plain shots into styled scenes ‚Äî cozy bedroom, boho living rooms, even handheld shots ‚Äî with one click. Includes retouch, resize, background removal & more.

name: Ollama Desktop App
tagline: The easiest way to chat with local AI
description: Ollama's new official desktop app for macOS and Windows makes it easy to run open-source models locally. Chat with LLMs, use multimodal models with images, or reason about files, all from a simple, private interface.

name: Hecco AI
tagline: Your personal health intelligence engine
description: Most health apps throw advice at you. Hecco AI reads your lab reports, vitals, and history to decode what‚Äôs actually going on ‚Äî into clear, actionable insights. No jargon, no guesswork. Just trustworthy, personalised guidance.

name: Mixio
tagline: The AI livestreaming platform
description: Mixio.ai is an AI Livestreaming platform that allows you to create, schedule, and manage livestreams with realtime AI streamers. Go Live using only AI, and the streamer will discuss topics with users, respond to users in real time on all streaming platforms.

name: Browserfly
tagline: AI agent that lives in your browser
description: Browserfly is an AI agent that lives in your browser. You give it a task and it will interact with the browser just like a human. No virtual machine, not another browser.

name: MCP Chat by Pipedream
tagline: Chat with your software, across 2700+ apps with 10k+ tools
description: MCP Chat enables you to chat with your software across 2700+ APIs & MCP servers with 10k+ tools. It includes built-in authentication management and tool discovery, and works with any LLM or framework.

name: Orca
tagline: Your AI language teacher
description: Orca is your one-on-one AI Language teacher to master German through real conversations. Speak, listen, and improve in real time ‚Äî anytime, anywhere. Orca listens, corrects you, and helps you sound more natural.

name: AI SDK 5 by Vercel
tagline: The AI toolkit for TypeScript
description: Building applications with TypeScript means building applications for the web. AI SDK 5 is the first AI framework with a fully typed and highly customizable chat integration for React, Svelte, Vue and Angular.

name: Spokenly
tagline: Type 4x faster with your voice
description: üéôÔ∏è Smart voice input for Mac that captures thoughts as fast as you think them. Works in every app with custom shortcuts, local Whisper models, and your own API keys. ‚ö°Ô∏è Replace typing, boost productivity instantly.

name: Obsidian to Notes
tagline: Import your Obsidian Vault to Apple Notes
description: Import your Obsidian vault to Apple Notes in seconds. Preserve formatting, folder structure, tables, attachments, and links. 100% offline.

name: Hunter, your AI career agent
tagline: Introducing you to your next job and manager
description: Talk to Hunter, your free AI career agent. Share what matters to you, and Hunter will scan 100k+ jobs daily, pick the ones that truly fit, and introduce you directly to hiring managers. Always on your terms, discreet and relevant.

name: AlphaEarth Foundations
tagline: A "virtual satellite" to map Earth in unprecedented detail
description: New AI model integrates petabytes of Earth observation data that stitches together data from actual satellite images, radar, climate simulations, and more to map Earth‚Äôs land and coastal waters.

name: ShotoAI
tagline: Edit your talking head start, start building your brand
description: AI-powered video editing that matches your vibe. Trending templates, music that fits your mood, cuts that keep your flow. Your signature style, amplified. Build your brand with every video you share.

name: NTRVSTA
tagline: Transform hiring with AI-powered solutions
description: Ntrvsta conducts live AI-powered interviews that adapt in real time to each candidate‚Äôs responses, adjusting difficulty, offering hints, and creating a fair, engaging experience. No more scheduling headaches. Hire faster with seamless ATS and CRM integrations.

name: Locoround
tagline: A location-based billboard for local life and events
description: Locoround is a community-first platform for digital handbills. Share promos, thoughts, or events with people nearby. Create location-based boards, drop real-time updates, and rediscover your neighborhood through real voices not algorithms.

name: BashNota
tagline: Offline-first second brain cracked on code and AI
description: BashNota is an offline-first notebook that combines Notion-like editing with Jupyter code execution capabilities. A open-source second brain cracked on Code and AI.

name: Tudle 2.0
tagline: Import conversation histories to your AI therapist
description: üöÄ Tudle 2.0 is here! Now you can import chats from WhatsApp, Telegram, iMessage & more‚Äîso your AI therapist knows *everything* from day one. Plus, enjoy smoother, more human-like voice convos. Smarter, faster, more you. üí¨üß†

name: Lingo Champion mobile apps
tagline: Acquire languages on the go from the news, videos etc.
description: Lingo Champion takes you from "some Duolingo" to fluency. It's focused on maximising language input (reading & listening). The new mobile apps let you learn on the go. And of course they contain the best features already available on desktop.

name: LightLayer
tagline: Review code 5x faster with your voice
description: Voice-native AI code review workspace that helps engineers review 5x faster. Highlight code, speak your thoughts, and it explains changes, points you to files, and drafts comments in your voice. It feels like a live review session with a senior team member.

name: Offloader
tagline: Free up disk space by offloading to iCloud Drive faster
description: Offloader is a smart iCloud Drive space saver that accelerates file offloading to save space on your Mac beyond what iCloud Drive will normally offload. Set custom offloading schedules, stay in control, and keep your Mac clean‚Äîautomatically.
